channel.title: XKey Updates
channel.description: XKey - Vietnamese Input Method for macOS

item.title: Version 1.2.19 (Build 20260120)
item.description:
What's New

fix(excel): Fix Vietnamese typing with AutoComplete interference

  • Add AXTextField support for Microsoft Office in AppBehaviorDetector

(fixes issues in dialogs like Data Validation, Find & Replace)

  • Send Forward Delete before backspaces in MS Office to clear AutoComplete

suggestions that interfere with character replacement

  • Improve hasTextAfterCursor() to account for selection length

(AutoComplete highlighted suggestions don't count as real text)

  • Update build version to 20260120

Xem chi tiết trên GitHub
